title: LOL CLIENT!!!
body: Hi Guys. Yesterday my league of legends was working perfectly, I tried it this morning and it wont get me to the screen to launch it. Can anyone help me on this issue. Thank you all!

replies.body:
Guys I have the solution it is just as Cieux said. Ok guys follow these steps.

Go to your avast and open the user interface.
Replace one of the shortcuts there in the overview and put virus chest.
Open virus chest.
Scroll down and look for the LOL launcher exe file, right click it and restore and add to exclusions. 
Click ok and try your League of legends it should work. Thanks Cieux for the help Spread this information guys!

I have the same issue - Can't open a simple program.

I do not have AVAST installed, my game just wont open. There are no other games that do this apart from League of Legends

CAN YOU FUCKING MORONS GET YOUR SHIT TOGETHER AND ACTUALLY HAVE A WORKING PRODUCT?

FUCKING MONKEYS
I do have avast, can you tell me what I need to do in order to fix the issue? How do I get to the virus chest? Thanks so much guys. :)

there are many other threads about the same issue this morning
if you are using Avast, your client has been put into the Virus chest.

if not, try the other solutions posted on other threads.

Sorry but this isn't a solution :( 
I've been having this exact same issue too. I've tried deleting files in rads folders, reinstalling, I've even uninstalled my antivirus in case it was that but nothing has worked so far. (So probably don't take these steps until an actual fix is posted)
This just happened out of nowhere and I still can't play. I was going to try re-download league again. :(
